channel.title: Weird instrument samples
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm screwing around with music creation tools, and I'm not sure how to go about this, but does anybody know how to find weird synth sounds, something that kind of sounds like the ones heard here in the background music:
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1oiom7L3Uj8&feature=player_detailpage#t=178s[/url]
I have no idea how I would search for those types of sounds.

item.title: Weird instrument samples
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
Get a synthesizer and make me yourself, or if you’re looking to spend a few days looking, you should dig through the Bruton Music Library.

This is the same kind of eerie semi-industrial stuff they play in medicine recall commercials and crime documentaries from the 1990s. This may help if you’re searching through themed volumes.

Read full topic
